name: Volguloth
description: The Volguloth is a Medium-sized fiend with strong physical attributes, exhibiting aggressive and stealthy tactics in combat.
memorable: Notable for its ability to grapple and enshroud targets while dealing significant poison damage with its attacks.
goals: Typically seeks to ambush and incapacitate foes through stealth and aggressive engagement.
relations: May be encountered alongside other fiends or as a servant of a more powerful demon or evil being.
environment: Commonly found in dark, subterranean lairs or shadowy realms where it can employ stealth.
strengths: Immunities to acid and poison damage, high stealth capabilities, and magic resistance.
weaknesses: Can only grapple and enshroud one creature at a time, limiting its crowd control options.
attacks: Strikes with claws for slashing damage, plus additional poison damage; can grapple and enshroud its targets.
most_powerful_ability: The Enshroud ability, which blinds, restrains, and suffocates grappled foes.
senses: Possesses blindsight out to 30 feet, allowing it to sense creatures in darkness without relying on sight.
skills: Highly skilled in Stealth, making it difficult to detect.
additional_information: Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against magical effects.
Glide ability allows it to slow its descent from heights.
Can apply lethal poison damage with its weapon attacks.
test_queries: monster that blinds and restrains foes
